column4: Oh yeah, also, can anyone recommend a program to batch convert large numbers of PDF/RTF/LIT to Text?
yeah you can do command line with it
for i in `ls *.pdf`; do pdf2text $i $i.txt; done
why are you having to install dri?
and glxgears does that go fast?
is your default depth set to higher than 24?
at the command line grep -i defaultdepth /etc/X11/xorg.conf
alright lets go for broke :) in a terminal type compiz --replace
say :( cause that doesn't support the glx module for X hence the error you are getting
